name: Physical Strike Team
description:
In a world where bombs don't exist, one team is sent over enemy lines to assassinate the leaders of the Axis powers using only their bodies. Your aim is to squash the dictators and save thousands of lives.

Controls:
  • Left analog stick = character movement
  • Right analog stick = forward (accelerate), backward (decelerate)
Info:
  • Dictators have a yellow beam marking their location
  • Dictators will speak throughout
  • Strike them physically with your body!
Credits:
  • Developers = Alex Horridge & Jake Chapman
Additional Assets:
  • BenSounds (Music)
  • MusOpen (Music)
  • Mixamo (Animations)
